ExampleDefinition.Title: Drag Horizontal Threshold
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to add a Horizontal line Annotation and drag via the mouse, recoloring the series when series-values pass a certain threshold
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Drag Horizontal Threshold</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Demonstrates how a HorizontalLineAnnotation (available in the Premium Edition of SciChart) and a Column Series can interact in an MVVM example. </Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Drag the line to see the colors of the Column Series change whenever the data-value is greater than the threshold.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Re-coloring of bars is provided by the RedIfOverThresholdPaletteProvider, a custom class which implements IPaletteProvider (available in the Standard or Premium editions) and is attached to the ColumnSeries. Using this method you can re-color data-points in Column, Line, OHLC and Candlestick Series depending on their data-value. </Run>
